name: 陳志恆
objective:
本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。

This course will introduce the types of surface active material and the preparation.
The adsorption phenomena of surfactant.
The theory and application of micell formation.
Surfactant application of surface modification.
Practical application of surfactants.
